translations: 外来的；没有关联的；来自体外的

sentences.sentence: We shall ignore factors extraneous to the problem.
sentences.translation: 我们应该撇开与此问题无直接联系的因素。

sentences.sentence: We do not want any extraneous information on the page.
sentences.translation: 我们不希望这一页上有任何无关的信息。

sentences.sentence: To avoid delays, she wanted the disaster relief legislation to be kept free of extraneous matters.
sentences.translation: 为避免延误，她希望无关紧要的事不被掺杂进灾害救济立法程序中。
